game.s_dis: Subway Surfers: Iceland takes the endless runner action to the icy landscapes of Iceland, playable online unblocked with new characters, boards, and themed collectibles.
game.l_dis:
Subway Surfers: Iceland – Dash Through the Icy European Landscapes

Subway Surfers: Iceland immerses players in Iceland’s frozen and stunning environments. Run, jump, and slide along icy subway tracks, dodging trains and obstacles while collecting coins, icebergs, and power-ups.

What is Subway Surfers: Iceland?

This seasonal World Tour edition features Icelandic-themed subway environments, new characters, outfits, and boards like the Cozy Cruiser. Collect themed items and complete Weekly Hunts for extra rewards.

How to Play Subway Surfers: Iceland?

  • Swipe Controls: Swipe up to jump, down to roll, left/right to switch lanes.
  • Collect Coins & Icebergs: Gather coins, icebergs, and other collectibles to unlock Weekly Hunt rewards like hoverboards and keys.
  • Dodge Obstacles: Avoid trains, icy barriers, and environmental hazards while maintaining your run.
  • Use Power-Ups: Activate magnets, jetpacks, and hoverboards to extend your run and maximize your score.

Why Play Subway Surfers: Iceland Unblocked?

Experience the stunning icy vistas of Iceland in Subway Surfers: Iceland online without restrictions, unlock new characters, outfits, boards, and themed collectibles.

Key Features

  • Icelandic Environment: Explore glaciers, frozen lakes, and volcanic landscapes.
  • Exclusive Characters & Boards: Unlock new characters and the Cozy Cruiser board.
  • Endless Runner Gameplay: Classic swipe-based controls with icy challenges.
  • Special Collectibles: Collect icebergs and themed items for Weekly Hunt rewards.
  • Unblocked Online: Play instantly in your browser anywhere.

Master Iceland's Subway Tracks!

Run, jump, and slide through Subway Surfers: Iceland to beat obstacles, collect rewards, and enjoy the stunning frozen landscapes!
